message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider selling it for $90?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $105. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about $95?  That's right in the middle.
I'm not quite ready to give up yet, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $102. It's a great value, and I think you'll really love the product!
